meanings.definition: Unable to be heard; not audible.
meanings.sent1: The inaudibility of the tiny insect's footsteps surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The inaudibility of the distant music made it hard to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The inaudibility of the whispered secret added to the mystery.
meanings.sent4: The inaudibility of the wind's gentle whispers calmed her soul.
meanings.sent5: The inaudibility of the falling snow created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inaudible.
meanings.sent1: The inaudibility of the room was perfect for meditation.
meanings.sent2: The inaudibility of the background noise made the speech clear.
meanings.sent3: The inaudibility of the joke's punchline left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The inaudibility of the silence in the library was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The inaudibility of the singer's voice added to the mystery of the song.
